game.name: EG Monkey Legend
game.description:
Are you ready to go on the biggest adventure of your life? Join EG Monkey Legend game and be prepared to handle a unique kind of task where the quantity of fun and adventure is limitless. We hope that this brand new platform game has everything you need to keep you engrossed for hours. The primary objective in this game is to help your monkey to go as long as possible over the platform that is full of different kinds of obstacles.  
It will be your responsibility to guide him when to run over the platforms and jump over the hindrances around multiple levels. Do not forget to help him to collect as much coins as you can in this cool adventure game. You can purchase new characters, advanced weapons also and some trendy outfits for your characters with the help of these coins. No need to show to pity on your enemies. Try to kill them as you spot them. 
These enemies can be in the form of wild pigs, flying bugs and foxes. Keep running and jumping and go as far as you can in this fun platformer game. Move forward and fight against deadly enemies until you defeat and put them down on the ground. This html5 adventurer game includes colorful graphics and easy controls supported by the fabulous storylines and seamless gameplay. Good luck to play like a true jumper in all 8 levels and have a blast!
